Does MRDS know WHICH ds I am playing on?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Does MRDS know WHICH ds I am playing on?
By Summit_trainer on Thursday, May 19, 2011 - 12:53 pm:

My mom is burrowing my DS, and MRDS just came, it is driving me crazy, please can anyone tell me, if I start on my Boyfriends DS, will the game know when I switch back to my own DS? Should I just drive down in this snowing CRAP to get my own DS?

By John Hawley on Thursday, May 19, 2011 - 04:04 pm:

You should be fine starting on the BFs DS and then switching to your own.

By Summit_trainer on Thursday, May 19, 2011 - 09:32 pm:
